body.p:
Lebanon Ky Oct 24/65
To his Excellency
Gov. Bramblett

The undersigned would most respectfully state that at the Feby June Term last, of our Marion Circuit Court George Graves had a judgment to go against him in favour of the Commonwealth of Ky for $200. for "Suffering Gaming on his premises" --

Believing him to be an exceeding clever young man, and just married to a very hansome and amiable young Lady and we think will sin no more, We beg your Executive clemency in his behalf,
and hope you will do him and us the favour of remitting that portion of Said fine going to the Commonwealth. with much respect

Yours truly
B. Spalding
L A Spalding
Martin Mattingly
Sam. Spalding
Jas G Phillips
R A Burton

P. S.
We learn that a petition has been sent to you heretofore in regard to the matter, but he supposes it has never reached you.
